attributes.action: Lower speed limits in the uk to secure better safety for horses and riders
attributes.additional_details: There are more distraught cases each time of riders suffering terrible injuries and horses being fatally killed and animals knocked over in the forest. The road is meant to be designed as a safe place to drive especially for young drivers and people drive far too fast is injuring or killing and animal going to get you to your destination quicker. Something needs to change for the safety of everyone thank you
attributes.background: Lower speed limits in the uk lanes and roads to secure better safety for horses and riders

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Decrease the speed limit on country roads for the protection of animals
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714644
